Package com.scvngr.levelup.core.ui.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LevelUpCodeCache
    A cache for LevelUp payment codes.
    LevelUpCodeView.OnCodeLoadListener
    A listener which will be notified when a LevelUp code is being loaded.
    LevelUpQrCodeGenerator
    Generate a LevelUp QR code.
    PendingImage.LoadCancelable
    A class that can cancel a load, given a key.
    PendingImage.OnImageLoaded<T2>
    Callback to call when an image has been loaded.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncTaskCodeLoader
    Loads and caches LevelUpQrCodeGenerator.LevelUpQrCodeImages using AsyncTasks.
    HashMapCache
    A simple in-memory cache of the codes.
    LevelUpCodeLoader
    Load a LevelUp payment QR code.
    LevelUpCodeView
    A view that displays a LevelUp QR code.
    LevelUpQrCodeGenerator.LevelUpQrCodeImage
    A bitmap of a QR code with information about the QR code targets.
    PendingImage<T>
    An image that can be loaded later.
